name: Elite Sniper Assassin - City contract killer 2017
name_original: Elite Sniper Assassin - City contract killer 2017
description:
The most wanted sniper game is out for free on IOS platforms. Aim your target enemies with highly advanced verity of sniper rifles. Play different and challenging missions to kill the enemies without being identified and shot. Be careful of the enemy snipers as they will also retaliate to protect their fields and armed personnel.

You have to kill and eliminate your enemies and defend their counter attack. Plan your mission with stealth mode and kill the enemies without any disruption or noise.

The elite sniper assassin have the extreme realistic graphics and addictive gameplay that will hold you to play more missions. The simple FPS controls of the game made it fun to play for hours and enjoy the shooting and sniper mode missions. Select the modes and different sniper gun with different characteristics according to the mission requirements.

Features:

▪ Smooth 3D game controls
▪ User friendly GUI and environment
▪ Different advance sniper guns and weapons
▪ Multiple exciting and challenging missions
▪ Amazing AI and realistic sound effects
